enb_long_title: Tenth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Working Group II (WGII-10) and Thirty-eighth Session of the IPCC (IPCC-38)
section_title: FUTURE RISKS AND OPPORTUNITIES FOR ADAPTATION:
sentences: On a sentence in the introductory paragraph noting that the section points to opportunities for managing risks through adaptation and mitigation, the US, supported by Canada, Ireland, India, the EU and Saudi Arabia, suggested that it should also refer to 'reducing risks', which was agreed to by the Group.
